TextLibrary.Text: Elistara
Thank you for the herbs. The Mages will cast their spells, and I will report back to you shortly.
Thank you for the herbs. The Mages will cast their spells, and I will report back to you shortly.
Thank you for the herbs. The Mages will cast their spells, and I will report back to you shortly.
Thank you for the herbs. The Mages will cast their spells, and I will report back to you shortly.
Elistara, how does Bane create the Arboleth?
Elistara, how does Bane create the Arboleth?
Elistara, how does Bane create the Arboleth?
Elistara, how does Bane create the Arboleth?
They are formed from the body parts he throws away as he experiments to create new servants. He turns the Arboleth loose to keep travelers and adventurers out of his lands.
They are formed from the body parts he throws away as he experiments to create new servants. He turns the Arboleth loose to keep travelers and adventurers out of his lands.
They are formed from the body parts he throws away as he experiments to create new servants. He turns the Arboleth loose to keep travelers and adventurers out of his lands.
They are formed from the body parts he throws away as he experiments to create new servants. He turns the Arboleth loose to keep travelers and adventurers out of his lands.
Very effective. Have you been seeing more Arboleth than normal lately?
Very effective. Have you been seeing more Arboleth than normal lately?
Very effective. Have you been seeing more Arboleth than normal lately?
Very effective. Have you been seeing more Arboleth than normal lately?
Yes, we have. Some have even been seen here over the mountains though we do not know how they get through.
Yes, we have. Some have even been seen here over the mountains though we do not know how they get through.
Yes, we have. Some have even been seen here over the mountains though we do not know how they get through.
Yes, we have. Some have even been seen here over the mountains though we do not know how they get through.
Looks like you were right, then. Bane has been building an army of Undead - a huge army! These Arboleth are merely the waste products of his efforts.
